info.headline: Tornado Warning issued April 07 at 7:01PM EDT until April 07 at 7:15PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM EDT FOR THE SOUTHEASTERN CITY OF CHESAPEAKE... At 701 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Northwest, or 8 miles south of Great Bridge, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. This dangerous storm will be near... Fentress around 710 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include Mount Pleasant and Hickory. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
